name: Diggillion
description:
Dig your way to riches in a world of procedurally generated, fully destructible terrain!

Can you dig a million?

Controls

A/D - Move left/right
Space or W - Jump
Mouse - Aim drill
Left-click - Dig
Right-click - Place
Escape - Quit

Music by Augmentality (https://opengameart.org/content/lost-in-the-meadows)

Made in less than 3 days for Ludum Dare 48

Note: I recommend to play the downloadable version, the web version is slower and sometimes has issues with audio.
